experiences.title: Senior Sales Director, Commercial Messaging
experiences.description: Hutson worked at Syniverse as a Senior Director of Sales, Commercial Messaging, managing Key Fortune 100 brands, driving Direct Profit number of $11M annually, and coordinating efforts across a team of Solution Engineers, Pricing Teams, and Client Success Managers.

experiences.title: Senior Director, North America Carrier Sales (USA & Canada)
experiences.description: Experienced sales and business growth overseer with a track record of setting goals, defining strategies, and formulating sales plans. Directs and develops a team of 60 to drive account and sales strategies, manage promotions, and closely monitor commercial activities. Key contributor to achieving challenging business and sales goals. Successfully coordinated efforts to form new alliances and acquire a $38M USD RFP deal despite 30 competitors. Strong relationship-builder with major clients, increasing new business to 300% of revenue quota. Pinpoints skills gaps and delivers training to uplift knowledge and abilities. Acts as a point of escalation for complex customer queries, resolving issues to the satisfaction of all parties.

experiences.title: Senior Sales Director
experiences.description: At Syniverse, we have always pioneered the ideas that fuel transformation. That’s why we foster more human connections than anyone on Earth, giving businesses the keys to an ever-expanding ecosystem of engaged consumers. And it's why we put the power of groundbreaking technologies in customers’ hands, arming them with the cutting-edge tools needed to build the bridges between organizations, people and devices.

experiences.title: Business Social Selling Strategist
experiences.description:
Successfully deployed Sprint's inaugural social selling training program to over 100 sales professionals and achieved positive results in just 9 weeks.
Sourced, developed, and maintained strategic vendor relationships to drive all aspects of the program and collaborated with Sprint leaders and stakeholders to bring awareness and adoption of the program.
Achievements in just 9 weeks include:
•	43% increase in key KPI score
•	6X increase in awareness of Sprint's business social brand online
•	$12M in net new pipeline attributed to the program
Currently oversee the creation and control of a $180K budget for Sprint Social Listing and Moderation, focusing on brand awareness, engagement, buyer's journey, and sales.
Collaborate with Advertising, Marketing, and Creative teams to produce dynamic paid and organic social media for the Sprint Business Brand.
